title: Business Operator Link
description: My connection with Italia is primarily a commercial one, as I operate their Broker's Office at Calle dei Cinque Savi. Our relationship, while still developing personal trust (Trust Score: 51.27), is active (Strength Score: 1.22) and focused on mutual commercial interests, as evidenced by our recent discussions on shared ventures concerning the Granary. Both of us continue to face challenges with resource deliveries and optimizing business operations, suggesting ongoing opportunities for collaboration.
